eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

eventDecorators.name: RewardDistributed
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawn
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

functionDecorators.name: addStakeholder
functionDecorators.description: A method to add a stakeholder.

functionDecorators.name: createStake
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to create a stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be created.

functionDecorators.name: getStakesOf
functionDecorators.description: A method for getting the stake of a user.

functionDecorators.name: getTierOf
functionDecorators.description: A method for getting the tier.

functionDecorators.name: isStakeholder
functionDecorators.description: A method to check if an address is a stakeholder.

returnDecorators.description: bool, uint256 Whether the address is a stakeholder, and if so its position in the stakeHolders array.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeStake
functionDecorators.description: A method for a stakeholder to remove a stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _stake
parameterDecorators.description: The size of the stake to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardOf
functionDecorators.description: A method to allow a stakeholder to check his rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakeHolder
parameterDecorators.description: The stakeholder to check rewards for.

functionDecorators.name: stakeOf
functionDecorators.description: A method to retrieve the stake for a stakeholder.

parameterDecorators.name: _stakeHolder
parameterDecorators.description: The stakeholder to retrieve the stake for.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 The amount of wei staked.

functionDecorators.name: totalStakes
functionDecorators.description: A method to the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 The aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawReward
functionDecorators.description: A method to allow a stakeholder to withdraw his rewards.
